statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeComplaints;
SELECT employee_name, complaint_date FROM EmployeeComplaints WHERE investigation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_description FROM EmployeeComplaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeComplaints WHERE employee_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT employee_name, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM EmployeeComplaints GROUP BY employee_name HAVING total_complaints > 3;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeComplaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeComplaints WHERE complaint_id > 100 AND investigation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT employee_name, complaint_description FROM EmployeeComplaints WHERE LENGTH(complaint_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeComplaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_complaints, investigation_status FROM EmployeeComplaints GROUP BY investigation_status ORDER BY total_complaints DESC;
SELECT * FROM Complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, employee_id, complaint_text, complaint_date FROM Complaints WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT complaint_id, employee_id, complaint_date, complaint_text FROM Complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT investigation_id, complaint_id, investigator_id, investigation_date FROM Investigations WHERE investigator_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM Investigations ORDER BY investigation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE employee_id = 5 ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM Complaints WHERE employee_id = 8;
SELECT complaint_id, employee_id, complaint_text, complaint_date FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01' AND complaint_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM Complaints;
SELECT c.complaint_id, i.investigator_id, i.investigation_date FROM Complaints c LEFT JOIN Investigations i ON c.complaint_id = i.complaint_id;
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT investigator_id, investigation_notes FROM investigations WHERE complaint_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT complaint_text FROM complaints WHERE complaint_id = 10;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM complaints;
SELECT employees.first_name, investigations.investigation_notes FROM employees JOIN investigations ON employees.employee_id = investigations.investigator_id;
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_date, complaint_text FROM complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE investigator_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM investigators WHERE specialization LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM investigations INNER JOIN investigators ON investigations.investigator_id = investigators.investigator_id WHERE investigations.findings LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT MAX(employee_id) AS highest_employee_id FROM employees;
SELECT investigator_name, specialization FROM investigators WHERE specialization = 'Forensics';
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, employee_email FROM Investigators WHERE investigator_id = 3;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text, complaint_date FROM EmployeeComplaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, compliance_status FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT employee_id, complaint_text FROM EmployeeComplaints JOIN Employees ON EmployeeComplaints.employee_id = Employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeComplaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC, complaint_text ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT Employees.first_name, Employees.last_name, EmployeeComplaints.complaint_text FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeComplaints ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeeComplaints.employee_id WHERE Employees.last_name LIKE 'S%' AND EmployeeComplaints.complaint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT Investigators.first_name, Investigators.last_name, COUNT(Investigations.investigation_id) AS total_investigations FROM Investigators LEFT JOIN Investigations ON Investigators.investigator_id = Investigations.investigator_id GROUP BY Investigators.first_name, Investigators.last_name ORDER BY total_investigations DESC;

SELECT Employees.first_name, Employees.last_name, ComplianceRecords.compliance_status FROM Employees JOIN ComplianceRecords ON Employees.employee_id = ComplianceRecords.employee_id WHERE ComplianceRecords.compliance_date < '2022-10-01' AND ComplianceRecords.compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY Employees.last_name ASC;
SELECT InvestigatorId, MAX(investigation_date) AS last_investigation FROM Investigations GROUP BY InvestigatorId HAVING last_investigation <= '2022-12-31';
